messages.message: Thank you for connecting! Nice work!
Thanks! That's kind of you to say!! Nice connecting with you!
I love food and my brother aspires to be a chef for a large hotel chain. Any software needs?
Awesome! I loved working at the Park Hyatt, in Washington DC!! Don't think I have any software needs, and, to be honest I don't even think I know what that means!! Haha!!!
